channel.title: Article by Francois Chollet about AI, social media, and personal information assistants
channel.description: This [article](https://medium.com/@francois.chollet/what-worries-me-about-ai-ed9df072b704) might be useful to folks thinking about how to augment and enable better information consumption by using AI techniques. Francois explains how AI algorithms are currently used by social networks and then gives some guidance about how the same techniques can be used for personal information assistants.
